name: Modmail
description: An easy to install Modmail bot for Discord - DM to contact mods!

mailGuildId.description: The id for the server you are hosting this bot for.

mainGuildId.description: Comma separated user IDs of people that are allowed to use owner only commands. (eval).

logChannelId.description: Mongo DB connection URI for self-hosting your data.

status.description: The url of the log viewer app for viewing self-hosted logs.
